name: Something Something Geo ?
description:
this was made purely as a learning tool for myself, unity 2D and playfab

very simple game that can be kind of fun. and the music is relaxing... to me atleast, and sound effects are a mix of royalty free and home made recordings.

use the arrows keys on your keyboard that correspond with the arrows on the screen (top,bottom,left,right) to stop the "evil?" orbs from getting to the centre of the screen. you can hold then keys endlessly but this will result in a reduction of your score.
